subject: Accidents and Safety
lead_paragraph: In a move that runs counter to the league’s medical study findings, the N.F.L. announced that teams should not return formerly unconscious players to the game or practice in which they were injured.
snippet: In a move that runs counter to the league’s medical study findings, the N.F.L. announced that teams should not return formerly unconscious players to the game or practice in which they were injured.
